trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied to its class definition.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que apenas é uma propriedade anexada pesquisável num elemento que também tenha outro específico [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] aplicado a respetiva definição de classe.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: O significado do termo `browsable` como utilizados nas descrições para este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] é semelhante a descrições para determinados <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, mas o estado pesquisável para uma propriedade anexada é especialmente relevante para obter informações de propriedade para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], porque uma propriedade anexada é principalmente um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] conceito.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
trans-unit.target: Isto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] só deve ser aplicado o acessor de obtenção das definições de propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.
trans-unit.target: Não se aplicam esta [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] para o acessor.

trans-unit.source: Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
trans-unit.target: Embora intuitivo seja a operação de conjunto que está a ser efetuada pesquisável para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] nos elementos relevantes, é a presença e características do acessor get na propriedade definir elemento que controla o comportamento verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações gerais sobre as propriedades anexadas declarativo, consulte [ligado descrição geral de propriedades](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> is applied..
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] que também devem ser aplicados de uma classe por ordem para a propriedade anexada ser pesquisável na classe onde <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> é aplicada …</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] que também devem ser aplicados de uma classe.

trans-unit.source: The AttributeType value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.
trans-unit.target: O valor de AttributeType só pode ser definido através de `attributeType` parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] construtor.</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se atual <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] é igual a um objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação suporta igualdade de valor do valor pode ser definida uma possível exposta por este atributo, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para este <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação suporta vários valores de hash possíveis baseados no valor pode ser definido uma possível exposto por este atributo, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>
Um valor de número inteiro sem sinal de 32 bits.
